definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Especially since the game is ten times as customisable.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在輻射三的開放性還要大十倍的情況下。

sentences.english: In ancient China, there was an open and super-stable reading system.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代社會有一個兼具開放性與超穩定的閱讀系統。

sentences.english: Huizhou culture is a culture of openness.
sentences.chinese: 徽州文化是開放性的文化。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the treatment of the open trauma of the auricle of pinna.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結頸部開放性外傷臨牀救治經驗。

sentences.english: Openness is the next thing on my mind.
sentences.chinese: 開放性是我下一步要想的事情。

sentences.english: Education is much more open-ended and all-inclusive than schooling.
sentences.chinese: 與上學相比，教育更具開放性，內容更廣泛。

sentences.english: Methods 107 cases of open tibia fracture were treated with compressive external fixation.
sentences.chinese: 方法107例脛骨開放性骨折骨外固定加壓治療。

sentences.english: So the next is open innovation.
sentences.chinese: 所以下一步是開放性的創新。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the use of ultrasonically activated scalpel (UAS) in open thyroid surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲刀在開放性甲狀腺手術的臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up clinical experience of open hemothorax .
sentences.chinese: 目的總結開放性血氣胸臨牀治療經驗。

sentences.english: There has been almost complete radio silence on trade and open investment .
sentences.chinese: 對於貿易和開放性投資已經是杳無音訊了。

sentences.english: PK was in accordence with open bicameral model.
This task is open-ended. It can never be finished.
sentences.chinese: 這項任務是開放性的，永遠也完成不了。

sentences.english: To investigate the causes and treatment of complications of open tibial fractures.
sentences.chinese: 探討開放性脛骨骨折併發症的形成原因和處理方法。

sentences.english: Open reduction for fracture of carpal, tarsal, meta-carpal, meta-tarsal.
sentences.chinese: 腕，跗，掌，跖骨骨折開放性復位術。

sentences.english: But the net is losing some of its openness and universality.
sentences.chinese: 但是互聯網的確正在喪失他的開放性以及通用性。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
